title: Books
author: The Children's Hospital
description: Find books featuring vaccine information authored by Paul Offit, MD, of the Vaccine Education Center, and by other experts in the field.
cleaned_text: Contact Us Vaccine Books Reviewed on May 30, 2023 Books by Paul Offit, MD - You Bet Your Life: From Blood Transfusions to Mass Vaccination, The Long and Risky History of Medical Innovation — published in 2021 by Basic Books. The book is available from [the publisher](https://www.hachettebookgroup.com/titles/paul-a-offit-md/you-bet-your-life/9781541620391/), [Amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/You-Bet-Your-Life-Transfusions/dp/1541620399)and [Barnesandnoble.com](https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/you-bet-your-life-paul-a-offit-md/1138556810). - Overkill: When Modern Medicine Goes Too Far — published in 2020 by HarperCollins. This book is available from [Amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/Overkill-When-Modern-Medicine-Goes-ebook/dp/B07V6BK7XG)and [Barnesandnoble.com](https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/overkill-paul-a-offit-md/1130698113). - Bad Advice: Or Why Celebrities, Politicians, and Activists Aren't Your Best Source of Health Information — published in 2018 by Columbia University Press. The book is available from [Amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/Bad-Advice-Celebrities-Politicians-Information/dp/0231186983)and [Barnesandnoble.com](https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/bad-advice-paul-offit-md/1127585506#/). - Pandora's Lab: Seven Stories of Science Gone Wrong — published in 2017 by National Geographic. The book is available from [Amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/Pandoras-Lab-Seven-Stories-Science/dp/1426217986)and [Barnesandnoble.com](https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/pandoras-lab-paul-a-offit/1125399070). - Bad Faith: When Religious Belief Undermines Modern Medicine - published in 2015 by Basic Books. The book is available from [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/Bad-Faith-Religious-Undermines-Medicine/dp/0465082963)and [Barnesandnoble.com](http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/bad-faith-paul-offit/1120148430?ean=9780465082964). - Do You Believe in Magic? The Sense and Nonsense of Alternative Medicine — published in 2013 by HarperCollins. The book is available from [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/Do-You-Believe-Magic-Alternative/dp/0062222961/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1364219663&sr=8-1&keywords=do+you+believe+in+magic%3F+offit)and [Barnesandnoble.com](https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/do-you-believe-in-magic-paul-a-offit/1113200655?ean=9780062222985). - Vaccines and Your Child: Separating Fact from Fiction — Co-authored by Charlotte A. Moser and published in 2011 by Columbia University Press. The book is available from [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/Vaccines-Your-Child-Separating-Fiction/dp/0231153074/ref=sr_1_1), [Barnesandnoble.com](http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/vaccines-and-your-child-paul-a-offit/1111756872?ean=9780231153072)and [Columbia University Press](https://cup.columbia.edu/book/vaccines-and-your-child/9780231153072). - Deadly Choices: How the Anti-Vaccine Movement Threatens Us All — published in 2010. The book is available from [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/Deadly-Choices-Anti-Vaccine-Movement-Threatens/dp/0465029620/ref=la_B001ILIGP6_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1364224164&sr=1-1)and [Barnesandnoble.com](http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/deadly-choices-paul-a-offit/1023499546?ean=9780465057962). - Autism's False Prophets - published in 2008 by Columbia University Press. The book is available from [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/Autisms-False-Prophets-Medicine-PROPHETS/dp/B001TI9G8E/ref=sr_1_3), [Barnesandnoble.com](https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/autisms-false-prophets-paul-a-offit/1012737857)and [Columbia University Press](https://cup.columbia.edu/book/autisms-false-prophets/9780231146364). - Vaccinated: One Man's Quest to Defeat the World's Deadliest Diseases — published in 2008 by Harper Perennial. The book is available from [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/Vaccinated-Defeat-Worlds-Deadliest-Diseases/dp/006122796X/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1348160305&sr=8-1&keywords=vaccinated+one+man%27s+quest+to+defeat+the+world%27s+deadliest+diseases)and [Barnesandnobile.com](https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/vaccinated-paul-a-offit/1103372046). - The Cutter Incident: How America's First Polio Vaccine Led to the Growing Vaccine Crisis — published in 2005 by Yale University Press. The book is available from [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/Cutter-Incident-America%C2%92s-Vaccine-Growing/dp/0300126050/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1389622569&sr=1-1&keywords=the+cutter+incident%20)and [Barnesandnoble.com](https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/the-cutter-incident-paul-a-offit-md/1140378791?ean=9780300126051). Other books - Vaccines: What Everyone Needs to Know — Written by Kristen Feemster, MD, and published by Oxford University Press in 2017. This book offers information about vaccine science, history, policy and law among other topics. It is available from [Amazon.com](https://www.amazon.com/Vaccines-What-Everyone-Needs-Know%C2%AE/dp/0190277912/)and [Barnesandnoble.com](https://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/vaccines-kristen-a-feemster/1125022883?ean=9780190277918). - The Panic Virus: A True Story of Medicine, Science and Fear — Written by Seth Mnookin and published in 2011 by Simon & Schuster. The book is available from both [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/The-Panic-Virus-Medicine-Science/dp/B004WB1AAC/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1333448946&sr=1-1)and [Barnesandnoble.com](http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/panic-virus-seth-mnookin/1102177688?ean=9781439158654&itm=1&usri=the+panic+virus). - Expecting 411: Clear Answers & Smart Advice for Your Pregnancy — Co-authored by obstetrician and gynecologist, Michele Hakakha and pediatrician, Ari Brown and published by Windsor Peak Press in 2012. This book provides information about all aspects of pregnancy and childbirth. The book is available from [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/Expecting-411-Answers-Advice-Pregnancy/dp/1889392421/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1364236220&sr=1-1&keywords=expecting+411). - Complete Idiot's Guide to Vaccinations — Co-authored by Michael J. Smith, MD and Laurie Bouck. This book explains how vaccines work, how they are tested and monitored, and which vaccines recommended at different ages. Also covered are various related topics such as the cycle of influenza epidemics, why there are sometimes shortages of vaccines, and which vaccines may be developed next. The book is available from [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/The-Complete-Idiots-Guide-Vaccinations/dp/B008SM3XVU/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1364236357&sr=8-1&keywords=complete+idiot%27s+guide+to+vaccinations). - Unstrange Minds: Remapping the World of Autism — Written by Roy Richard Grinker, a professor of anthropology at George Washington University and the dad of a daughter who has autism. In his book, Grinker brings together these two worlds with touching stories about his daughter and a global view of autism. The book is available from both [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/Unstrange-Minds-Remapping-World-Autism/dp/0465027644/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1364236600&sr=1-1&keywords=unstrange+minds)and [Barnesandnoble.com](http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/unstrange-minds-roy-richard-grinker/1103235217?ean=9780465027644). - Do Vaccines Cause That?! A Guide for Evaluating Vaccine Safety Concerns — Written by Martin G. Myers, MD, and Diego Pineda and published in 2008. It is available from [Amazon.com](http://www.amazon.com/Vaccines-Evaluating-Vaccine-Safety-Concerns/dp/0976902710/ref=pd_bbs_sr_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1217004666&sr=8-1). - Epidemiology and Prevention of Vaccine-Preventable Diseases, 13th Edition — Commonly known as "The Pink Book," the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's guide contains the latest information and updates on immunizations. The book is available from the [CDC's website](http://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/pubs/pinkbook/index.html). - The Vaccine Handbook: A Practical Guide for Clinicians — Written by Gary Marshall, MD. The eighth edition was published in 2019 by PCI Books and is meant to help providers navigate the world of vaccinology. The book is available from [Professional Communications, Inc](http://www.pcibooks.com/books/view/49). - Yellow Book — An informational guide produced by the CDC that outlines medical information necessary for international travel. The book is available from the [CDC's website](https://global.oup.com/academic/product/cdc-yellow-book-2024-9780197570944?cc=us&lang=en&). Next Steps Contact Us Materials in this section are updated as new information and vaccines become available. The Vaccine Education Center staff regularly reviews materials for accuracy. You should not consider the information in this site to be specific, professional medical advice for your personal health or for your family's personal health. You should not use it to replace any relationship with a physician or other qualified healthcare professional. For medical concerns, including decisions about vaccinations, medications and other treatments, you should always consult your physician or, in serious cases, seek immediate assistance from emergency personnel.
